lines.text: I was right! When I said they was... undertakers!
I heard you, walking up and down, master. Thought you might want something.
Perhaps you'd like the evening paper?
No, there's nothing in the papers.

[UPSET]
Oh! Call a doctor. Call a doctor!
Why should the master have left his brother anything? He never cared for him; never came to see him while he was alive.
Perhaps he will be the first of the heirs to die.
According to the master's will, the rest of us will inherit his share.
